title: Challenge 1: Configure Ruff for Your Project
description:
Create a complete Ruff configuration in pyproject.toml for a web API project. The configuration should:
- Target Python 3.13
- Use 88 character line length
- Enable common rule categories (E, F, I, UP, B, SIM)
- Ignore print statements in scripts folder
- Configure isort to recognize your package name
instructions: Write a complete [tool.ruff] configuration section for pyproject.toml.

hints.text: Start with [tool.ruff] section containing line-length and target-version.
Add [tool.ruff.lint] with select = ["E", "F", "I", "UP", "B", "SIM"] for common rules.
Use [tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores] with pattern "scripts/*" = ["T201"] to allow print in scripts.

commonMistakes.mistake: Using string instead of list for select
